data.question: What is the chemical formula for the material NbU-1?
What is the BET surface area of NbU-1?
Does NbU-1 exhibit higher C2H2 uptake at 273 K or 298 K?
Is the adsorption selectivity of C2H2/C2H4 for NbU-1 greater at 273 K or 298 K?
True or False: NbU-1 has a cubic crystal system.
What is the dimensionless breakthrough time (τbreak) for NbU-1 in the separation of C2H2/C2H4 mixture (50/50) at 293 K?
True or False: The adsorption enthalpy for C2H2 is higher than for C2H4 in NbU-1.
What is the ratio of CuI:CuII in NbU-1 according to XPS analysis?
True or False: NbU-1 is more stable under boiling acidic conditions than most MOFs.
What is the primary method used for the synthesis of NbU-1?
What is the role of adenine in the structure of NbU-1?
data.answer: It acts as a ligand linking Cu ions.

data.question: True or False: The adsorption capacities of NbU-1 follow the trend C2H2 > C2H4 ≈ C2H6.
What is the Langmuir surface area of NbU-1?
True or False: NbU-1 exhibits the highest kinetic selectivity for C2H2/C2H4 separation among the MOFs mentioned.
What is the main advantage of NbU-1 over other MOFs for C2H2/C2H4 separation?
data.answer: It has the highest efficient kinetic selectivity.

data.question: True or False: NbU-1's structure is based on heptanuclear Cu7(OH)6 clusters.
What is the purity of ethylene obtained in the separation of C2H2/C2H4 using NbU-1?
True or False: NbU-1 is not suitable for thermodynamic separation of C2H2/C2H4.
What is the role of planar metal-binding sites in NbU-1?
data.answer: They enforce interactions with acetylene molecules.

data.question: True or False: The synthesis of NbU-1 requires extremely cheap starting materials.
